name: caveHallwayA
Perc_SUCC: You spot a small trail of food crumbs, cheese, salted pork leading deeper into the cavern.
Invest_SUCC: You spot a small trail of food crumbs, cheese, salted pork leading deeper into the cavern.
Perc_FAIL: You don't see anything of value

combatDesc: A high-pitched hiss alerts you to trouble from above. On the ceiling there are eight-legged, multi-eyed rodents. They bare their needlelike teeth before leaping off the ceiling at your face!
